 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נְגַד‎</span>] **verb** ==stream, flow== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נְגַד‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***draw along, lead***, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] also intransitive ***move along*** [[Isa.30.24|Isa 30:24]], ***flow*** [[Deut.33.13|Deut 33:13]]; [[Deut.33.22|Deut 33:22]], <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נַגְדִּין‎</span> ***streams*** [[Isa.44.4|Isa 44:4]] +); — 

**Pe\`al** ***Participle*** [[Dan.7.10|Dan 7:10]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נְהַר דִּי נגֵד וְנָפֵק מִןקֳֿדָמוֺהִי‎</span>.
